member.name: T:JurikSoft.Proxy.ProxyProvider
member.summary: Represents the class that contains implementation of the TCP Tunneling technique for connection through Socks 4, 4a, 5, and HTTPS Proxy Servers.

member.name: T:JurikSoft.Proxy.ProxyProvider.BaseProxyEventHandler
member.summary: Represents the method that will handle the Proxy events.

member.summary: Occurs when the JurikSoft Proxy Provider send a connection request to Socks Server version 5.

member.summary: Occurs when the JurikSoft Proxy Provider send a Authentication request to Socks Server version 5.

member.summary: Occurs when the JurikSoft Proxy Provider send a request details to Socks Server version 5.

member.name: E:JurikSoft.Proxy.ProxyProvider.SendingSocks4ConnectionRequest
member.summary: Occurs when the JurikSoft Proxy Provider send a connection request to Socks Server version 4.

member.name: E:JurikSoft.Proxy.ProxyProvider.SendingHTTPSConnectionRequest
member.summary: Occurs when the JurikSoft Proxy Provider send a connection request to HTTPS Proxy Server.

member.name: E:JurikSoft.Proxy.ProxyProvider.SendingHTTPSAuthenticationRequest
member.summary: Occurs when the JurikSoft Proxy Provider send a Authentication request to HTTPS Proxy Server.

member.summary: Occurs when the JurikSoft Proxy Provider wait reply to connection request from Socks Server verion 5.

member.summary: Occurs when the JurikSoft Proxy Provider wait reply to Authentication request from Socks Server verion 5.

member.name: E:JurikSoft.Proxy.ProxyProvider.WaitingForReplyToSocks4ConnectionRequest
member.summary: Occurs when the JurikSoft Proxy Provider wait reply from Socks Server verion 5 to sent connection request.

member.name: E:JurikSoft.Proxy.ProxyProvider.WaitingForReplyToHTTPSConnectionRequest
member.summary: Occurs when the JurikSoft Proxy Provider wait reply from HTTPS Proxy Server to sent connection request.

member.name: E:JurikSoft.Proxy.ProxyProvider.WaitingForReplyToHTTPSAuthenticationRequest
member.summary: Occurs when the JurikSoft Proxy Provider wait reply from HTTPS Proxy Server to sent Authentication request.

member.name: P:JurikSoft.Proxy.ProxyProvider.SerialNumber
member.summary: Serial Number of your product copy sent to your Registration Name
member.remarks:
If you are not registered you will see the following message every time when you Connect to necessary Host through Proxy Server using JurikSoft Proxy Provider:
"You are using the FREE COPY of JurikSoft Proxy Provider. Please register a copy of JurikSoft Proxy Provider at http://www.juriksoft.net to disable this appear message."
You can purchase a copy of this software product at http://www.juriksoft.net.
One copy (serial number) entitles to use this software product to one software developers team.

member.name: P:JurikSoft.Proxy.ProxyProvider.RegistrationName
member.summary: Registration Name that you use when you buy JurikSoft Proxy Provider
member.remarks:
If you are not registered you will see the following message every time when you Connect to necessary Host through Proxy Server using JurikSoft Proxy Provider:
"You are using the FREE COPY of JurikSoft Proxy Provider. Please register a copy of JurikSoft Proxy Provider at http://www.juriksoft.net to disable this appear message."
You can purchase a copy of this software product at http://www.juriksoft.net.
One copy (serial number) entitles to use this software product to one software developers team.

member.name: M:JurikSoft.Proxy.ProxyProvider.ConnectThroughSocks4Proxy(System.Net.Sockets.Socket@,System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Connect input Socket object to selected Server through Socks Proxy Server version 4.
member.overloads: Connect to selected Server through Socks Proxy Server version 4.
member.param: Reference to Socket object, which will be connected to the selected Host through necessary Socks Proxy Server.
Parameter string_DstHost are used for the indication of Host address to which one should connect through Socks Proxy Server.
Parameter int_DstPort are used for the indication of Port of the Host address to which one should connect through Socks Proxy Server.
Parameter string_ProxyHost are used for the indication of Socks Proxy Server Host address.
Parameter int_DstPort are used for the indication of Port of Socks Proxy Server Host to which one should connect.
Parameter bool_UseProxyToResolveHostnames are used for the indication of domain name resolve mode: Resolve name to IP address by client or send domain address to Proxy Server to resolve.
Parameter int_TimeOutMS are used for the indication that how many time the client must wait for response to any sent request.

member.name: M:JurikSoft.Proxy.ProxyProvider.ConnectThroughSocks4Proxy(System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient@,System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Connect input TcpClient object to selected Server through Socks Proxy Server version 4.
member.param: Reference to TcpClient object, which will be connected to the selected Host through necessary Socks Proxy Server.
Parameter string_DstHost are used for the indication of Host address to which one should connect through Socks Proxy Server.
Parameter int_DstPort are used for the indication of Port of the Host address to which one should connect through Socks Proxy Server.
Parameter string_ProxyHost are used for the indication of Socks Proxy Server Host address.
Parameter int_DstPort are used for the indication of Port of Socks Proxy Server Host to which one should connect.
Parameter bool_UseProxyToResolveHostnames are used for the indication of domain name resolve mode: Resolve name to IP address by client or send domain address to Proxy Server to resolve.
Parameter int_TimeOutMS are used for the indication that how many time the client must wait for response to any sent request.

member.name: M:JurikSoft.Proxy.ProxyProvider.ConnectThroughSocks5Proxy(System.Net.Sockets.Socket@,System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Connect input Socket object to selected Server through Socks Proxy Server version 5 with Plain Text authentication.
member.param: Reference to Socket object, which will be connected to the selected Host through necessary Socks Proxy Server.
Parameter string_DstHost are used for the indication of Host address to which one should connect through Socks Proxy Server.
Parameter int_DstPort are used for the indication of Port of the Host address to which one should connect through Socks Proxy Server.
Parameter string_ProxyHost are used for the indication of Socks Proxy Server Host address.
Parameter int_DstPort are used for the indication of Port of Socks Proxy Server Host to which one should connect.
Parameter string_UserName are indicate User Name used for the Basic authorization to connect to necessary Proxy Server.
Parameter string_Password are indicate Password used for the Basic authorization to connect to necessary Proxy Server.
Parameter bool_UseProxyToResolveHostnames are used for the indication of domain name resolve mode: Resolve name to IP address by client or send domain address to Proxy Server to resolve.
Parameter int_TimeOutMS are used for the indication that how many time the client must wait for response to any sent request.
